privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Flexi Business Hub, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

infoCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
infoCollect.description: We collect the following types of data:
infoCollect.personalInfo: Personal Information: Name, email address, login credentials
infoCollect.businessData: Business Data: Sales, expenses, ad costs, financial documents
infoCollect.technicalData: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information
infoCollect.cookies: Cookies: Used for analytics, functionality, and security
infoCollect.thirdPartyData: Third-Party Data: Data from Facebook, TikTok, Shopee, LINE (after your consent)

dataUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
dataUse.notify: Notify you of abnormal spending or performance trends
dataUse.assist: Assist with tax preparation and compliance
dataUse.respond: Respond to inquiries and provide customer support

thirdPartyAccess.title: 3. Third-Party Data Access
thirdPartyAccess.description: We access data from third-party platforms only after you grant permission via secure OAuth APIs. This includes:
thirdPartyAccess.revoke: You may revoke this access through the third-party platform at any time.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We do not sell your personal data. We may share:
dataSharing.providers: Information with trusted service providers under strict confidentiality
dataSharing.legal: Data when required by law or to protect rights and safety

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.active: As long as your account is active
retention.legal: As needed to comply with legal obligations or resolve disputes

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.complaint: File a complaint with a regulatory authority
rights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at: support@flexibusinesshub.com

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.description: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.

security.title: 8. Security Measures
security.description: We use encryption, access controls, and regular audits to protect your data. While we strive to secure your information, no system is completely secure.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this policy periodically. If changes are significant, we'll notify you by email or through the platform.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Flexi Business Hub! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform and related services. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

overview.title: 1. Overview of Services
overview.description: Flexi Business Hub is a cloud-based platform that automates the collection and analysis of business data including:
overview.adAnalysis: Advertising spend analysis (Facebook, TikTok, Shopee, LINE)
overview.taxTools: Tools to assist with tax submission and optimization

registration.title: 2. Account Registration
registration.description: You must create an account to access the service. You agree to:
registration.responsible: Be responsible for all activity under your account

acceptableUse.title: 3. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.interfere: Interfere with the service or others' use of it
acceptableUse.reverseEngineer: Reverse engineer or attempt unauthorized access to our systems

dataOwnership.title: 4. Your Data and Ownership
dataOwnership.description: You retain all rights to the data you provide or generate through our platform. You grant us a limited license to use this data only for the purposes of:
dataOwnership.insights: Providing insights and analysis to you

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Integrations
thirdParty.description: Our platform connects to third-party platforms (Facebook, TikTok, Shopee, LINE) via their official APIs, and only with your explicit authorization.
thirdParty.rightToAccess: You confirm that you have the right to access and share that data
thirdParty.compliance: You agree to comply with the respective platform's terms
thirdParty.revocation: You understand you can revoke access at any time, though this may limit features
thirdParty.disclaimer: We are not responsible for data accuracy or availability from third-party platforms.

security.title: 6. Data Security and Storage
security.description: We implement security measures to protect your data. However, no system is foolproof. We encourage you to maintain your own backups.

termination.title: 7. Termination and Suspension
termination.description: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms. You may terminate your account at any time by contacting support.

disclaimers.title: 8. Disclaimers and Limitations of Liability
disclaimers.description: Flexi Business Hub is provided "as is." To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim all warranties and are not liable for indirect or consequential damages, including data loss or lost profits.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Thailand. Any disputes shall be resolved in Thai courts.

landing.title:
Minimize Your Task 
Maximize Your Profit
landing.subtitle: The all-in-one business management solution for modern entrepreneurs and growing businesses
landing.description:
Automate your business with our free tools 
 Flexi Business Hub

feature1.title: Smart Financial Dashboard
feature1.description: Get real-time insights into your business performance make data-driven decisions with our AI-powered dashboard. Track sales, expenses, and ad performance all platforms in one place.

feature2.title: Ad Overspend Alerts
feature2.description: Get notified when your ads aren't performing or when budgets exceed expectations

feature3.title: Secure and Reliable
feature3.description: Your data security is our top priority. We use industry-leading encryption and security measures to protect your business information.

feature4.title: Automated Expense Management
feature4.description: Easily manage your business expenses with our automated tools. Upload bank statements, categorize expenses, and generate tax-ready reports.

howto.title: ðŸ”§ How to Integrate
howto.description1: Getting started with Flexi is simple. Register your account and connect your social media platforms.
howto.content2: 2. login your account and consent to access data for each platform
howto.description2: Flexi will Integrate your e-commerce platforms, payment systems, and marketing tools. Our system automatically synchronizes your data across all channels.
howto.content3: 3. Let's start to use Flexi Business Hub
howto.description3: Monitor your business performance through comprehensive dashboards and detailed analytics.Make informed decisions by tracking key metrics, receiving intelligent insights, and utilizing our reporting tools.

vision.title: Our Business Vision
vision.subtitle: To empower small businesses in Southeast Asia with the tools they need to thrive in the digital age. We believe in making advanced business management accessible to everyone, regardless of size or budget.
vision.description1: Empowering businesses with actionable insights to make informed decisions and achieve sustainable growth.
vision.description2: Adapting global best practices while understanding regional market nuances in Southeast Asia.
vision.description3: Building trust through transparent business practices and reliable system performance.

footer.subtitle: Transforming how small businesses manage their finances, track performance, and grow profitably in the digital economy.
